title: How much would this coin be worth today? - Quora

response.answer_text: What you have isn’t a coin, but appears to be souvenir sold by the White House Gift shop: COIN, PRESIDENTIAL SEAL ON FRONT, THE WHITE HOUSE ON REVERSE, 1.5'' DIAMETER, Premium Copper Allow Core, GOLD PLATED, Quality Protective Capsule, Same as Code 34005 In the condition showed, it’s worth considerably less.
Image of the coin in question.
